Special Powers
THEY ARE COMING OUT OF THE WALLS!: Leadership, Mastermind. When Brood Queen uses Leadership and succeeds, you may instead generate a XMRF #014 Brood on click #1. // POWER: Generate a XMRF #014 Brood normally or adjacent to a square of blocking terrain within 4 squares on click #1.
PROTECTING THE QUEEN: Toughness. // Whenever Brood Queen takes damage, after resolutions you may move each friendly character named Brood up to 2 squares.

Comments
September 5, 2021
gambitrmp
I just realized something else. That defense special is on EVERY clix. They could have just made it a trait. I know someone will say why not. At first I was thinking because traits might be safeguarded against outwit but she has the Cosmic TA ability so that's basically already covered. This way the mastermind & toughness are in 2 difference powers. I'd kind of like the mastermind in the more visible damage slot not that it matters much. I doubt I'll forget to use it like I do some traits.
August 26, 2021
gambitrmp
Fun is the name of the game for me. Combining her with the Uncanny X-Men Brood should be fun. I might put both Queens on the team. Then then new cheap ones can carry the Broodlings around. It's great using ones entire collection rather than being limited to a few of the most recent sets. Glad I don't play retirement rules.
August 12, 2021
Goop
More "fun" than good. Maybe if the broods were autonomous you would have something here but she's is really just going to drain your actions moving broods around. I suppose in a high point game you could run multiples of her rolling willpower/leadership/power actioning every turn. If your opponent doesn't deal with them quickly her army could become massive. Fun stuff.
